sentences: Selene Here Vigil (born July 16, 1965) is an American singer and musician.
She co-founded grunge band 7 Year Bitch alongside Elizabeth Davis, Valerie Agnew and Stefanie Sargent in 1990; they released three studio albums before disbanding in 1997.
In 2000, Vigil formed a gothic band, Cistine.
In 2010, Vigil released her debut solo album, That Was Then.
"M.I.A." on Notes From The Underground, Vol. 2 (Priority Records, 1995).
